file_content.text: You poor stupid, stupid, stupid man. You know your daughter helped me set up phase two?
What?
We're not just taking out droids for a day. I've got explosives planted around the city. Roads, factories, security stations, news centers.
This time, when everything burns? No fire suppressor units. No medical droids. No Skytroopers stopping riots.
You never mentioned that.
Surprise.
You get it now, Tayvor? You tried to use me. You all humiliated me. Now your happy city is going to hurt.
You're talking about hundreds of lives. They aren't responsible for what you've been through.
You can't murder innocents.
They were part of it. Every one of them.
Besides, you should be backing me. I know what these people took from you. They stole your life. It'd feel good to hit back.
I'll even let you do the honors--you blow the controls, I'll take the city.
They'll have no idea how to respond without their droids. Even once the machines are back online, they'll be repairing infrastructure for months.
That might do useful damage.
Probably. If you're talking tactics, never hurts to make your enemy scared, either.
I have the data I came for. You want to burn the city down, go ahead--but I'm not waiting.
Let's get this over with.
These people stole your life and mine, Agent. We had it good; I didn't see it until you were gone.
So I say we do this together.
Meaning what?
You blow the droid controls, I detonate the city.
I want to do this with you, Agent. It's not the same as shooting Arcann, but we had something special and they ruined it.
I've known you a long time. You can be cruel and capricious and vengeful....
You're better than this.
This isn't cruel. Someone hits you, you hit back!
...but you're one of the strongest people I know. You can take a blow. Spite and pettiness are beneath you.
That mean I'm doing this alone?
You tell me.
Tell you what... you want to do the honors? You blow the controls, I'll take the city?
It's not the same as shooting Arcann, but I know what these people took from you. They stole your life. It'd feel good to hit back.
It might feel good--but only briefly. Ruining the Spire won't bring back what we've lost.
Let this go, Kaliyo.
Nothing will bring back what I lost.
Then stop obsessing over the past. Find something worth striving for.
Fine--we do it your way. But I'm still taking down the droids.
Let's get out of here before half of Zakuul marches in.
Whatever your long-term plan is, it better end with Zakuul's empire crashing down--or I'm coming for you, too.
You have the gun. I don't need to pull the trigger.
Do it yourself.
Suit yourself.
Yes. I'll have my revenge.
It's past time Zakuul began to pay. This is only the beginning.
I've been waiting for payback too long. This is a start.
Time to go before an army of Knights shows up.
